author: Glowrified
text:
Lovelies!
Please don't ignore those red flags... 
It is better to accept the truth and have your peace.
 Leaving toxic relationship is not easy though.
The healing process is draining.
Please save yourself.
 Na me know wetin I dey face now.... Please 🙏
